messages.title: The Best Choice for Reading East
messages.content: Anneliese Dodds leads a team of University researchers working on ways to make the NHS safer for patients. Now Anneliese wants to win back Reading East for Labour. Last time only a few votes separated Labour and the Tories. So your vote counts.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour has put Britain in the lead internationally on climate change. Anneliese will support international targets and promote green jobs.
Labour standards at local schools in Berkshire has continuously have improved, and she'll be working with them all to get the boudary changes people are getting to University.
The Royal Berkshire Hospital has new health facilities thanks to Labour, and Anneliese says she'll fight to stop kitchen table treatment and she'll abolish treatment guarantees.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only 475 votes separated Labour and the Tories last time in Reading East.

leaflet.personalStatement: Anneliese lives here in Reading. She has made a clear commitment to be a full-time MP and to accept only the average local wage for doing the job.

endorsements.endorsement: Iâ€™ve been very impressed by Anneliese. She works hard on local problems, has a real command of the big issues and will make a great MP for you to vote for her.
